Uses of Class
shellshocker.EnemySprite

    • Uses of EnemySprite in shellshocker

      Subclasses of EnemySprite in shellshocker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Boss
      Creates a boss enemy that guards the final level of the ShellShocker game. The boss enemy differs from other enemies because it has more health, weapons, and cannot be avoidable in order to complete the mission goal in the game.
      class  Enemy
      Creates enemy objects that have patrol areas of the game. The enemies serve the purpose of impeding progress for the user-based character and can be destroyed.
      class  SmartEnemy
      Creates a smart enemy object that impedes the movement of the user-controlled character. Smart enemies are capable of following the main character.
      class  Tower
      Creates tower objects. The tower objects have attributes of location. The purpose of the tower is the same as that of an enemy: to impede the user-controlled character.
      Methods in shellshocker that return types with arguments of type EnemySprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> ScanIn.scanInEnemy()
      Returns an ArrayList full of EnemySprite objects after scanning data in from a text file.
      Method parameters in shellshocker with type arguments of type EnemySprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Ragnar.canMoveDown(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundList, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemyList, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactorList) 
      boolean Ragnar.canMoveLeft(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundList, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemyList, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactorList)
      Checks to find whether or not the main character can move to the left. Potential objects that inhibit movement include walls, platforms, doors, and enemies.
      boolean Ragnar.canMoveRight(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundList, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemyList, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactorList) 
      boolean Ragnar.canMoveUp(java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> boundList, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemyList, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactorList) 
      void StatusTracker.update(int p, int s, int a, int b, int m, int h, int f, int pl, int sl, int al, int bl, int ml, int hl, int fl, java.util.ArrayList<Boundary> bound, java.util.ArrayList<EnemySprite> enemy, java.util.ArrayList<Reactor> reactor)
      Updates the information for the status tracker.
